name: Twitter Undistracted
description: A minimized Twitter interface with a motivation that lets you focus more on what people tweet and response with less judgments on their character. What this style does to your Twitter * Removes profile picture, because you don't wanna care what people look like * Removes followings/followers count, because it adds nothing valuable in this society * Removes unnecessary tabs and sidebar, because it's distracting * Keeps you focus and avoid unnecessary simping over stupid tweets by a twitter thot Found bugs and in need of improvements, DM me @binatangberuk No longer on Twitter.
